Birdhouse Building

That’s not what I meant!: Deconstructing Sideline Discourse

By Ryan Oto | March 21, 2015 | 10 min read

This will be Bird’s 4th year in existence. By the standards of mixed ultimate that many of the people on this team came from, it is a miracle that we came this far. We were built from parts of teams that intentionally rebranded each year, and now live as a team that fights for its very life each day.

2015 Bird Captains

By Ty Thorsen | March 21, 2015 | 1 min read

Bird is back for the 2015 season.

After a 4th place finish at Regionals in 2014, Bird will compete as a Select Flight team out of the North Central in this year's USAU Triple Crown Tour.

about bird

Bird is an ultimate frisbee club from Minneapolis, Minnesota. Bird competes in the Select Flight of the USA Ultimate Mixed Club Series.

Founded in 2012, Bird brought together various groups of talented Minnesota players, many with Carleton, St. Olaf or South High School roots. In that inaugural season, Bird would compile a 20-9 record, finishing 5th at North Central Regionals. In 2013, the team would compete in its first Regional final en route to a 3rd place finish, and hold the dubious honor of being the only team to defeat eventual National Champion Drag'n Thrust in the USAU Series.

The team has high expectations coming into the 2014 season, looking to become even more competitive and raise its profile on the national level.
